short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browser into a serene, moody nighttime setting with Midnight Street Lights.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browser into a serene, moody nighttime setting with Midnight Street Lights. This extension brings a quiet, deserted road lit by street lamps under the dark night sky as your browser's backdrop. Ideal for those who enjoy minimalist, calming aesthetics. The subtle blue hues and soft lighting create a focused atmosphere perfect for late-night browsing or work sessions.

Note: This extension is in beta, and more customization options like shortcut icons and search bar styles will be available in future updates.
